data.eml:eml: The genus Quartinia Ed. Andre, 1884 (Hymenoptera, Vespidae, Masarinae) in Southern Africa. Part VI. New and little known species both with complete and incomplete venation

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gess, Friedrich W. (2012): The genus Quartinia Ed. Andre, 1884 (Hymenoptera, Vespidae, Masarinae) in Southern Africa. Part VI. New and little known species both with complete and incomplete venation. Journal of Hymenoptera Research 24: 95-115, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/JHR.24.2155, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/JHR.24.2155
